message: When the gate opens, we are greeted by cheerful music and the sound of firecrackers.

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Welcome to Platinum Jail, Japan's biggest amusement park, the place where love and dreams come true!"
A weird-looking panda totters out to greet us.
I see five white doors behind it.

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Only the chosen are allowed to enter paradise! Please, enjoy your stay!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Paradise?"

name: ミンク
message: "What a load of shit."
Not at all bothered by our lack of enthusiasm, the panda cheerfully pushes a button on the wall.

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Now where, oh where will you two be headed? Let's spin the wheel of fun!"

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Oh my! You two will be going to Black Valley! Right this way!"
The panda totters over to the second door from the right, then starts throwing punches and kicks at the air.

name: 案内パンダ
message: "This is a dangerous area for those of you looking for a little 'adult' excitement!"

name: 案内パンダ
message: "It'll be a heart-pounding adventure. You'll never know what's going to happen next! I do hope it meets your expectations! Enjoy!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Talk about obnoxious..."
Mink ignores me. He's staring at, no through the panda, right through to the screen behind it.

name: ミンク
message: "Like moths to a flame."
Mink murmurs under his breath.
He's not wrong. If this is a trap, we're leaping right in.

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Please place your ticket or invitation on the authentication screen next to the door!"
The authentication screen next to the door lights up.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Invitation..."
I open the invitation on my Coil and approach the screen.

name: 認証モニター
message: "Platinum ID confirmed. Welcome to Platinum Jail, Mr. Seragaki and companion. Admission procedures initiated."

name: 認証モニター
message: "Issuing guest ID to your companion. Please present your companion's Coil."
Mink holds his Coil up to the screen.
Mink's a fugitive... Is this going to work?

name: 認証モニター
message: "Confirmed. Guest ID linked. All privileges belong to the Platinum Jail ID."
Despite my concerns, Mink's ID is confirmed without issue.
But why? Is Platinum Jail's security that lax?
Or does it not matter as long as you have an invitation?
Either way, that's one less thing to worry about...

name: 認証モニター
message: "Please exercise caution, as the guest ID has more restricted privileges in some respects."

name: 認証モニター
message: "For additional details, please refer to the support section of your invitation card. Enjoy your time in the park."
